title.rendered: Skip Staging! Test Docker, Helm, and Kubernetes Apps like a Pro

content.rendered:
In this week’s webinar, Sauce Lab’s Product Marketing Director Ken Drachnik joined Codefresh’s Dan Garfield to show you how to test Docker, Helm, and Kubernetes apps like a pro!

The traditional “staging” model is getting in the way of adequately testing our applications. With the power of Kubernetes, Helm, Sauce Labs, and Codefresh you can dramatically speed up and improve the quality of integration testing using short-lived environments.

Click on the webinar link below to learn how to create automated short-lived environments for every commit/branch, run integration tests in a scalable way, and see how Kubernetes changes the game.

Check it out here:

Watch the Webinar

You can also view the slide deck below:

Skip Staging! Test Docker, Helm, and Kubernetes Apps like a Pro from Codefresh

New to Codefresh? Get started with Codefresh by signing up for an account today!
